34487429$Ancient City - Rainbow Ruins$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Field$$$You must have this many "Crystal Beast" cards in your Spell & Trap Card Zone to activate and to resolve these effects. ● 1+: This card cannot be destroyed by card effects. ● 2+: Once per turn (including the opponent's) you can halve the Battle Damage you take. ● 3+: During either player's turn

column5: during your Main Phase: You can draw 1 card. ● 5: Once per turn
